message: Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - plugily.projects.thebridge.commands.arguments.game.*.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - java.util.*.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.*' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.thebridge.utils.Utils'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.stream.Collectors' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.thebridge.utils.Utils'.
'||' has incorrect indentation level 14, expected level should be 16.
'.' has incorrect indentation level 6, expected level should be 8.
'"&7Edit existing arena\n&6Permission: &7thebridge.admin.edit"' has incorrect indentation level 6, expected level should be 8.
'.' has incorrect indentation level 6, expected level should be 8.
